Package ana.epj2.model

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
ana.epj2.model.Bill
public class Bill extends Object
Represents a bill for a rental in the e-mobility system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Bill for the specified rental.

    • createBillFile

      public boolean createBillFile()
      Creates a text file for the bill, containing all details related to the rental and the total payment amount. It also includes discounts or promotions if applicable. The file is saved in a directory specified in the application properties file.
      Returns:
      true if the bill file is created successfully, false otherwise

    • printBill

      public void printBill()
      Prints the bill by creating a text file with the formatted bill details. If the bill creation fails, it prints an error message to the console.

    • getRepairCost

      public double getRepairCost()
      Calculates and returns the repair cost for the vehicle if it has a malfunction. The repair cost is calculated based on the repair coefficient and the purchase price of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      the repair cost for the vehicle, or 0.0 if the vehicle has no malfunction

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the object
